activities: In general, FactSet does not collect or request personal information from clients, and discourages clients from sending it.  Market Metrics and Matrix, (FactSet subsidiaries), conduct market research on advisor-sold investments and insurance, and collect names and business contact information from survey respondents in the EU.  Please see Market Metrics’ safe harbor page at http://safeharbor.export.gov/companyinfo.aspx?id=21410.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: (1) Portfolio holding and client contact information incidental to investment managers’ use of our products, which is ordinarily processed via computer, and (2) information collected from survey respondents by Market Metrics and Matrix, which is ordinarily collected by telephone and processed via computer.
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) or their authorized representative.
